Import FantasyPros Projections

Source: R/fp_projections.R
fp_projections.Rd

Scrapes FantasyPros ranks from the specified page (and optionally, returns metadata).

fp_projections(page, ..., sport = NULL, include_metadata = NULL)

Arguments

page

which page
...

named arguments to pass as query parameters
sport

the sport to look up, defaults to nfl
include_metadata

logical - default FALSE (only return tibble), if TRUE returns list with both tibble and metadata

See also

https://github.com/dynastyprocess/data

https://www.fantasypros.com

Examples

# \donttest{
fp_projections("qb")

#> # A tibble: 78 x 13
#>    fantasypros_id player_name        team  passing_att passing_cmp passing_yds
#>    <chr>          <chr>              <chr>       <dbl>       <dbl>       <dbl>
#>  1 17298          Josh Allen         BUF          615.        408.       4675.
#>  2 16413          Patrick Mahomes II KC           645.        431.       5071.
#>  3 18600          Kyler Murray       ARI          584.        386.       4103.
#>  4 17233          Lamar Jackson      BAL          457.        289.       3333.
#>  5 18635          Justin Herbert     LAC          632.        415.       4720.
#>  6 9001           Aaron Rodgers      GB           574.        388.       4450.
#>  7 15600          Dak Prescott       DAL          610.        404.       4623.
#>  8 9603           Tom Brady          TB           630.        406.       4800.
#>  9 11180          Russell Wilson     SEA          545.        362.       4095.
#> 10 16398          Deshaun Watson     HOU          522         363        4349 
#> # … with 68 more rows, and 7 more variables: passing_tds <dbl>,
#> #   passing_ints <dbl>, rushing_att <dbl>, rushing_yds <dbl>,
#> #   rushing_tds <dbl>, misc_fl <dbl>, misc_fpts <dbl>
fp_projections("wr", year=2020, week=2)

#> # A tibble: 207 x 11
#>    fantasypros_id player_name       team  rushing_att rushing_yds rushing_tds

#>  7 12119          Mike Evans        TB            0           0.2           0
#>  8 13429          Adam Thielen      MIN           0.2         1.2           0
